Package com.hoddmimes.distributor

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    DistributorConnectionIf
    A DistributorConnectionIf is an interface wrapping an UDP multicast transport i.e.
    DistributorEventCallbackIf
    Callback interface through which the distributor will pass unsolicited events back to subscribers and publishers
    DistributorPublisherIf
    This interface wrappes a publisher allowing an application to publish data over a connection to subscribers being connected to the "connection".
    DistributorPublisherStatisticsIf  
    DistributorSubscriberIf
    Interface wrapping an subscriber object.
    DistributorSubscriberStatisticsIf  
    DistributorUpdateCallbackIf
    Subscriber call back interface.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Distributor
    In order to send and receive broadcast data a Distributor instance has to be created.
    DistributorApplicationConfiguration
    An DistributorApplicationConfiguration object specifies global settings for a Distributor.
    DistributorCommunicationErrorEvent
    Distributor error event being signaled back to subscriber and publisher event callback routines.
    DistributorConnectionClosedErrorEvent
    This event is passed back to connected publisher/subscribers when distributor connection is being closed.
    DistributorConnectionConfiguration
    A DistributorConnectionConfiguration instance wraps the parameters defining the characteristics and behavior for a Distributor Connection.
    DistributorErrorEvent
    This class serve is an abstract class and server as base for all application events being of fatal nature.
    DistributorEvent
    Base class for all application events that could be passed to subscriber / publisher event routines.
    DistributorNaggingErrorEvent
    An error event being signaled when the connection can not keep up with remote connection and constantly generates retransmissions i.e.
    DistributorNewRemoteConnectionEvent
    Event to be passed to publishers/ subscribers when a distributor connection is created on a remote host This event is just of informational nature.
    DistributorRemoveRemoteConnectionEvent
    An event indicating that a remote application has closed down a distributor connection.
    DistributorRetransmissionNAKErrorEvent
    An error event being signaled to the publisher/subscriber when a missed message could not be recovered i.e.
    DistributorTooManyRetransmissionRetriesErrorEvent
    An event being signaled to the publisher/subscriber when a lost message could not be recovered i.e.
    transport  
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    DistributorEvent.DistributorEventSignal  
  • Exception Summary
    Exception Description
    DistributorException
    Distributor error exception used to signal (fatal) error exception
